001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.output;
002
003import java.io.BufferedOutputStream;
004import java.io.File;
005import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
006import java.io.FileOutputStream;
007import java.io.IOException;
008import java.io.OutputStream;
009import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
010import java.net.URI;
011import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
012import java.nio.channels.FileChannel;
013import java.nio.channels.FileLock;
014import java.util.Objects;
015import java.util.function.Consumer;
016
017import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
018
019import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
020import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder.BufferHints;
021import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEvent;
022import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput;
023import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
024import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProvider;
025import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogResponse.Status;
026import io.jstach.rainbowgum.MetaLog;
027import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable;
028import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.DefaultParameter;
029
030/**
031 * An output that is designed for writing to a file.
032 */
033public interface FileOutput extends LogOutput {
034
035        /**
036         * Default file buffer size. This size was chosen based on Logbacks default.
037         */
038        public static final int DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE = 8192;
039
040        @Override
041        default OutputType type() {
042                return OutputType.FILE;
043        }
044
045        /**
046         * Creates a file output provider from lambda builder.
047         * @param consumer builder lambda.
048         * @return provider.
049         */
050        public static LogProvider<FileOutput> of(Consumer<FileOutputBuilder> consumer) {
051                return (s, c) -> {
052                        var builder = new FileOutputBuilder(s);
053                        consumer.accept(builder);
054                        return builder.build();
055                };
056        }
057
058        /**
059         * Creates file output.
060         * @param name name of output not file name.
061         * @param uri file uri.
062         * @param fileName file name.
063         * @param append whether or not to append to existing file.
064         * @param prudent logback prudent mode where files are locked on each write.
065         * @param bufferSize buffer size in bytes.
066         * @return file output.
067         * @throws UncheckedIOException if file not found.
068         */
069        @SuppressWarnings("resource")
070        @LogConfigurable(prefix = LogProperties.OUTPUT_PREFIX)
071        public static FileOutput of(@LogConfigurable.KeyParameter String name, @Nullable URI uri, @Nullable String fileName,
072                        @Nullable Boolean append, @Nullable Boolean prudent,
073                        @DefaultParameter("DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE") Integer bufferSize) throws UncheckedIOException {
074                boolean prudent_ = prudent == null ? false : prudent;
075                boolean append_ = append == null ? true : append;
076                IOSupplier<FileOutput> supplier = () -> {
077                        File file;
078                        URI uri_ = uri;
079                        if (fileName != null) {
080                                file = new File(fileName);
081                                uri_ = file.toURI();
082                        }
083                        else if (uri_ != null) {
084                                file = new File(uri_);
085                        }
086                        else {
087                                throw new IOException("fileName and uri cannot both be unset.");
088                        }
089                        createMissingParentDirectories(file);
090                        FileOutputStream stream;
091                        try {
092                                stream = new FileOutputStream(file, append_);
093                        }
094                        catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
095                                throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
096                        }
097                        if (prudent_) {
098                                return new FileChannelOutput(uri_, stream.getChannel());
099                        }
100                        OutputStream s;
101                        Objects.requireNonNull(bufferSize);
102                        if (bufferSize <= 0) {
103                                s = stream;
104                        }
105                        else {
106                                s = new BufferedOutputStream(stream, bufferSize);
107                        }
108                        return new FileOutputStreamOutput(uri_, s);
109                };
110
111                return new ReopenableFileOutput(supplier);
112        }
113
114        /**
115         * Creates the parent directories of a file. If parent directories not specified in
116         * file's path, then nothing is done and this returns gracefully.
117         * @param file file whose parent directories (if any) should be created
118         * @return {@code true} if either no parents were specified, or if all parent
119         * directories were created successfully; {@code false} otherwise
120         */
121        private static boolean createMissingParentDirectories(File file) {
122                File parent = file.getParentFile();
123                if (parent == null) {
124                        // Parent directory not specified, therefore it's a request to
125                        // create nothing. Done! ;)
126                        return true;
127                }
128
129                // File.mkdirs() creates the parent directories only if they don't
130                // already exist; and it's okay if they do.
131                parent.mkdirs();
132                return parent.exists();
133        }
134
135}
136
137@FunctionalInterface
138interface IOSupplier<T> {
139
140        T _get() throws IOException;
141
142        default T get() throws UncheckedIOException {
143                try {
144                        return _get();
145                }
146                catch (IOException e) {
147                        throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
148                }
149        }
150
151}
152
153class ReopenableFileOutput implements ForwardingOutput, FileOutput {
154
155        private volatile FileOutput fileOutput;
156
157        private @Nullable LogConfig config;
158
159        private final IOSupplier<FileOutput> supplier;
160
161        public ReopenableFileOutput(IOSupplier<FileOutput> supplier) {
162                super();
163                this.supplier = supplier;
164                this.fileOutput = supplier.get();
165        }
166
167        @Override
168        public void start(LogConfig config) {
169                this.config = config;
170                fileOutput.start(config);
171        }
172
173        @Override
174        public @Nullable LogOutput delegate() {
175                return fileOutput;
176        }
177
178        @Override
179        public URI uri() throws UnsupportedOperationException {
180                return fileOutput.uri();
181        }
182
183        @Override
184        public OutputType type() {
185                return fileOutput.type();
186        }
187
188        @Override
189        public BufferHints bufferHints() {
190                return fileOutput.bufferHints();
191        }
192
193        @Override
194        public Status reopen() {
195                this.fileOutput.close();
196                this.fileOutput = supplier.get();
197                var config = this.config;
198                if (config != null) {
199                        this.fileOutput.start(config);
200                }
201                return Status.StandardStatus.OK;
202        }
203
204}
205
206class FileOutputStreamOutput extends LogOutput.AbstractOutputStreamOutput implements FileOutput {
207
208        protected FileOutputStreamOutput(URI uri, OutputStream outputStream) {
209                super(uri, outputStream);
210        }
211
212}
213
214class FileChannelOutput implements FileOutput {
215
216        protected final URI uri;
217
218        protected final FileChannel channel;
219
220        public FileChannelOutput(URI uri, FileChannel channel) {
221                super();
222                this.uri = uri;
223                this.channel = channel;
224        }
225
226        @Override
227        public URI uri() throws UnsupportedOperationException {
228                return uri;
229        }
230
231        @Override
232        public void write(LogEvent event, byte[] bytes, int off, int len, ContentType contentType) {
233                write(event, ByteBuffer.wrap(bytes, off, len), contentType);
234        }
235
236        @Override
237        public void write(LogEvent event, ByteBuffer buffer, ContentType contentType) {
238                try {
239
240                        // Clear any current interrupt (see LOGBACK-875)
241                        boolean interrupted = Thread.interrupted();
242
243                        FileLock fileLock = null;
244                        try {
245                                fileLock = channel.lock();
246                                long position = channel.position();
247                                long size = channel.size();
248                                if (size != position) {
249                                        channel.position(size);
250                                }
251                                channel.write(buffer);
252
253                        }
254                        catch (IOException e) {
255                                MetaLog.error(FileChannelOutput.class, e);
256                        }
257                        finally {
258                                if (fileLock != null && fileLock.isValid()) {
259                                        fileLock.release();
260                                }
261                                if (interrupted) {
262                                        Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
263                                }
264                        }
265                }
266                catch (IOException e) {
267                        throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
268                }
269        }
270
271        @Override
272        public void close() {
273                try {
274                        channel.close();
275                }
276                catch (IOException e) {
277                        throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
278                }
279        }
280
281        @Override
282        public void flush() {
283                try {
284                        channel.force(false);
285                }
286                catch (IOException e) {
287                        throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
288                }
289        }
290
291        @Override
292        public WriteMethod bufferHints() {
293                return WriteMethod.BYTE_BUFFER;
294        }
295
296}
